Compliance & Content Policy

Free AI Tools is committed to maintaining a safe, ethical, and high-quality platform for all users.

Content Filtering & Safety

Our primary goal is to provide a comprehensive and valuable resource for discovering open-source AI models. To ensure a safe browsing experience for all our users and to comply with the policies of our advertising partners, such as Google AdSense, we have implemented a strict content filtering policy.

  • Automated NSFW Filtering: Our data processing scripts automatically scan the names, descriptions, and tags of all models fetched from external sources (like Hugging Face and Civitai).
  • Prohibited Content: Any model that contains keywords related to adult, explicit, or Not-Safe-For-Work (NSFW) content is automatically excluded from our website's listings. We maintain a zero-tolerance policy for sexually explicit material.
  • Ongoing Monitoring: We continuously update our filtering mechanisms to adapt to new data and ensure our platform remains clean and compliant.

Advertising Policy

To support the operational costs of this project, Free AI Tools displays advertisements. We are committed to adhering to the policies of our advertising partners. This includes, but is not limited to:

  • Ensuring all site content is family-safe and free of prohibited material.
  • Maintaining original, high-quality content that provides value to our users.
  • Providing a transparent and user-friendly site navigation experience.
  • Clearly distinguishing advertisements from main site content.

Reporting & Contact

We rely on our automated systems and community to help us maintain a high standard of quality. If you encounter any content on our site that you believe is inappropriate, violates our policies, or is displayed in error, please do not hesitate to contact us.

You can reach our compliance team at: compliance@free2aitools.com. We take all reports seriously and will investigate promptly.
